text:
Hello everyone!

My name is Johann and I’m one of the founders of <https://pop.work/|Popwork>, a SaaS tool that helps managers and their teams work better together (better conversations, more insights, actionable outcomes).

Looking forward to hearing from the community and learning as much as possible on B2B growth tactics.
Happy to share about my experiences where they can be helpful (10y+ in business & marketing positions at Google, Waze, PrestaShop)

Here's my <https://www.linkedin.com/in/johannmolinari/|linkedin>. Based in Paris btw

text:
Hey folks!

I'm Joel; a conversion copywriter and the founder of <https://www.casestudybuddy.com|Case Study Buddy>, a dedicated team that helps B2B companies capture, share, and cash in on customer success stories in written and video formats by taking care of the process from end-to-end.

We really believe in the idea of creating an ENTIRE campaign's worth of content from one solid interview, and we've done a metric buttload of thinking around solving the challenges of customer success stories, from buy-in to final deployment.

Outside of that, I'm really passionate about solving the problems around hiring and working with writers, and have been knuckling away at a bit of a course on that front that I'm committed to getting out next year.

I'm a Canadian, a bald guy, and a would-be runner training for my first 23km run in August up a mountain and through the woods.

Nice to be here!

attachments.fallback: Case Study Buddy: Case Study Buddy: The Customer Success Story Specialists
attachments.text: You do great work. We make it easy for you to share. So you can attract qualified leads and convert skeptical buyers with powerful success stories put together by the pros.
attachments.title: Case Study Buddy: The Customer Success Story Specialists

We really believe in the idea of creating an ENTIRE campaign's worth of content from one solid interview, and we've done a metric buttload of thinking around solving the challenges of customer success stories, from buy-in to final deployment.

Outside of that, I'm really passionate about solving the problems around hiring and working with writers, and have been knuckling away at a bit of a course on that front that I'm committed to getting out next year.

I'm a Canadian, a bald guy, and a would-be runner training for my first 23km run in August up a mountain and through the woods.

Nice to be here!

text:
Hi there, Superpath community! :blob-wave: New Superpath member here :woman-raising-hand: I <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/rewatch_give-a-warm-welcome-to-susannah-magers-our-activity-6871868584331743232-VOQL|recently joined> video communication startup Rewatch as Managing Editor – the third Marketing team hire on <https://www.linkedin.com/posts/rewatch_meet-courtney-our-product-marketing-lead-activity-6836377584989806592-VIvM|Courtney Chuang>’s product and content marketing team. <@U015ZCDEFCH> (Rewatch's Product and Content Marketing Lead) and I are thrilled to be here! :grinning_face_with_star_eyes: Links are to our Rewatch "welcome" posts on LinkedIn, where you can learn more about us and what we're up to – reach out, we'd love to hear from you.

Inspired by <@U02QBGXUH1U>’s “what I’m here for/how we can connect” addition to their intro post (thank you!) we’d love to offer the same. We’re open to conversations and connections to explore:

• Partnering on a piece of content, virtual event, podcast episode, and more :bookmark_tabs:
• The latest research, ideas, and content about video communication :bulb:
• Co-marketing, speaking, and contributed content opportunities :mega:
• Pitches and/or quotes for guest-contributed content to the Rewatch blog from content writers, editors, and other creative folks :eyes:
• Contributing to fostering a truly supportive, helpful, and collaborative content community here and beyond :sparkles:

text:
Hey Superpath community!

My name is Tanmay and I study in Northeastern University, pursuing Masters in Digital Media Connect.
I am the founder of <http://www.monolithicindia.com|Monolithic Media> and a freelance content writer as well. I specialise in creative content, Strategy and B2B Business content. So glad to be part of the community and looking forward to learn more and more!

Thank you!

You can reach out on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/tanmay-mehta-monolithicmedia/|LinkedIn> where I talk about random stuff - useful or not is for you to decide, haha!

Hey everyone. I’m Nupur from India, and I’ve recently joined the superpath community.
I am a content writer working with Mailmodo for the past five months. I am so thrilled to be a part of the community and to learn from fellow writers, marketers, creators, and others:grinning:

Here is my Linkedin and Twitter handle. Would love to connect with you all :)
<https://linktr.ee/nupur_mittal>
